headers.subject: [haXe] SWHX 1.1 Released - wnd.drag doesn't work on windows

quote.quotepara: I have also run into the issue Glen mentioned below - It seems in SWHX 1.1 the Window.drag() method does not work in the PC environment. I've tried it in my own app, and the Sampler apps with Plain and Transparent windows. I've tried to call it directly from the flash environment, and also via a private method in Haxe. (Had to change the function to public in window.hx).
However, to complicate this bug report, The window.drag() method Does work on the Mac just fine.
